item.title: Movie Quoteâ€¦
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: "You don't think I would've been prepared? Two years I invested in that elevator job, two years I invested in my life. You couldn't understand the commitment I have. You ruined a man's life's work and you think you can walk away? You got blinders on to the world! But I got your attention now didn't I?"
